name: Frank Edgar
notable_outcomes: Most significant wins include BJ Penn and Gray Maynard.

name: Conor McGregor
record: Former UFC Featherweight and Lightweight Champion
notable_outcomes: First fighter in UFC history to hold titles in two weight classes simultaneously.

name: Ronda Rousey
notable_outcomes: First female fighter inducted into the UFC Hall of Fame.

name: Georges St-Pierre
record: Former UFC Welterweight and Middleweight Champion
notable_outcomes: Considered one of the greatest mixed martial artists of all time.

name: Dana White
notable_outcomes: Instrumental in the growth and popularity of MMA globally.

name: Jon Jones
notable_outcomes: Regarded as one of the greatest fighters in MMA history.

name: Daniel Cormier
record: Former UFC Light Heavyweight and Heavyweight Champion
notable_outcomes: One of the few fighters to hold titles in two weight classes simultaneously.

name: Stipe Miocic
notable_outcomes: Most successful heavyweight title defenses in UFC history.

name: Nate Diaz
record: Known for his toughness and submission skills
notable_outcomes: Notable for his fights against Conor McGregor and Jorge Masvidal.

name: Henry Cejudo
record: Former UFC Flyweight and Bantamweight Champion
notable_outcomes: First fighter in UFC history to hold titles in two weight classes simultaneously and an Olympic gold medalist.
